content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>           Mr. Watson Okubo, Supervisor         </origin>         <origin>           Mr. Terence Teruya, QA Officer         </origin>         <pubdate>           Unknown         </pubdate>         <title>           State of Hawaii, Department of Health, Clean Water Branch State-wide Water Quality Sampling Dataset 1999-2006 (NODC Accession 0013723)         </title>         <onlink>           http://data.nodc.noaa.gov/accession/0013723         </onlink>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>         The Monitoring Section of the State of Hawaii, Department of Health, Clean Water Branch collects water quality data at over 300 coastal locations state-wide using well-established instruments and methodologies. This dataset spans 1999-2006.       </abstract>       <purpose>         The Clean Water Branch (CWB) protects the public health of residents and tourists who enjoy recreating in and around Hawaii&#146;s coastal and inland water resources. The CWB also protects and restores inland and coastal waters for marine life and wildlife. This is accomplished through statewide coastal water surveillance and watershed-based environmental management through a combination of permit issuance, monitoring, enforcement, sponsorship of polluted runoff control projects, and public education.       </purpose>       <supplinf>         NOAASupplemental: Entry_ID: Unknown Sensor_Name: water quality sensors Source_Name: manual Project_Campaign: State of Hawaii, Department of Health, Clean Water Branch State-wide Water Quality Sampling Storage_Medium: spreadsheet compatible, CSV ASCII Reference: None Online_size: 2842 kbytes       </supplinf>     </descript>     <timeperd>       <timeinfo>         <rngdates>           <begdate>             19990102           </begdate>           <enddate>             20061120 <eainfo>     <overview>       <eaover>         data/0-data (originator's files)  Filename:             tbl_Station_Information.csv Format:               comma-separated version text Contents: Field name            Description Storet No             Unique Station ID number Location              Station Name Island                Island of station Lat                   latitude of station (DD MM SS.SSS N) Long                  longitude of station (DDD MM SS.SSS W) Datum                 Datum used to obtain the Latitude and Longitude of the Station Comments              Narrative field for descriptive comments about the Station  Filename:             tbl_All_Data_from_1999.csv Format:               comma-separated version text Contents: Field name            Description Sample No             Unique Identifier for every record Sampler               Identifies who took the sample Lab No                Unique Lab Identifier assigned to the sample in the lab Station No            Same as tbl_Station_Information, Storet No. Location              descriptive location name Date                  month/day/year Time                  hour:minute:second AM or PM Depth(m)              depth of measurement (meters) <>FC                  Qualifier for the Fecal Coliform result FColi                 Fecal Coliform result <>Ent                 Qualifier for the Enterococcus result Entero                Enterococcus result <>CP                  Qualifier for the Clostridium perfringens result CP                    Clostridium perfringens result Temp                  temperature of the water sample, degrees Celcius Salinity              salinity (ppt) Cond                  salinity (mS/cm) DO                    Dissolved Oxygen (mg/L) DO%                   DO in percent saturation pH                    Hydrogen ion content Turbidity             (Nephelometric Turbidity Units, NTU) ORP                   Oxidation-Reduction Potential (mv) Remarks               comments
